name: muss
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something untidy: The wind is mussing (up) my hair.
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases

See more results »
no muss, no fuss
used to say that something can be done without a lot of difficulty: If we pack tonight, we can leave first thing in the morning - no muss, no fuss.
See more

Add to word list
to make messy: Don’t muss my hair (up) – I just had it styled.
